articles.content: It is no secret: NFTs are helping to destroy our planet. That Beeple sale not only racked up $69.3m, it also generated an eye-watering 78,597kg of CO emissionsthe same amount of electricity used by m… [+8366 chars]

articles.title: French MEP orders Brussels to open its eyes - 'London hasn't collapsed after Brexit!' - Daily Express
articles.description: A PROMINENT French MEP has turned on Brussels - urging deluded and bitter Eurocrats to stop trying to punish the UK over Brexit.
